title: How to Install an ARIES 3" Bull Bar on a Ram 1500
description: Get the run-down on what's needed for easy, bolt-on installation of your truck protection.
tags: Aries, Bull Bar, 3" Bull Bar, Dodge Ram 1500

asset.title: ARIES Bull Bar Install: 3" Bull Bar 35-5005 on Ram 1500
asset.description:
This video demonstrates the installation of the ARIES 35-5005 3" Bull Bar on a 2015 Ram 1500.  This bull bar is available in steel with a 304 stainless steel finish or high-gloss black powder coat finish.

Features Include:
Allows for addition of aftermarket lights
Removable skid plate
No-drill application

Part #
35-5005 (Stainless Steel Finish)
B35-5005 (Black Powder Coat Finish)
asset.author: ARIES Automotive
